abstract: Iranian state television broadcasts video showing deployment of Russian-made S-300 air defense system around its underground Fordo nuclear facility, area Iran had agreed to convert to technology and science center as part of nuclear deal; reason for detonation remains unclear.

headline.print_headline: Iran Deploys Air Defenses Around Fordo Nuclear Site
headline.main: Iran Deploys Air Defense System Around Fordo Nuclear Site

snippet: Video from Iranian state television showed trucks arriving at the site and missile launchers aimed skyward. It was unclear whether the system was fully operational....
lead_paragraph: Video from Iranian state television showed trucks arriving at the site and missile launchers aimed skyward. It was unclear whether the system was fully operational.
